context.title: LIBS
context.description: This is the PWM library for single phase PWM generation with dead time. It is used by PWMSP002 app and PWMMP001 app. This app does not consume any HW reqources so do not use it standalone.
This function is used to initialize the APP
This will reset the CCU8_CCy slice registers to default state.
This will start the Single Phase PWM with Dead Time APP which will in turn start the CCU8_CCy slice.
This will stop the Single Phase PWM with Dead Time APP which will in turn stop the CCU8_CCy slice.
This function will modify the duty cycle of the output waveform which will change the pulse width. Duty cycle is given in %
This will modify the PWM frequency.Period value is given in terms of the period register
This function will modify the duty cycle of the output waveform which will change the pulse width.Duty cycle is given in terms of the compare register value
This will modify the PWM frequency which is given in Hertz
This will update the timer register value when timer is stopped. This is used to set the starting value of the timer.
This will request the update of the period register, compare register values from the respective shadow transfers.
This function will read the period register value.
This function will reset the trap flag by checking whether trap condition is reset.
This function will read the timer values of compare register and period register.
This function will read the timer status whether timer is running or idle.
